publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3240# Donald Gorrie: Health in Developing Countries—That the Parliament encourages academic researchers and drug companies in Scotland to give a higher priority to developing medicines which will promote better health and nutrition in developing countries and considers that the Scottish Executive and Her Majesty’s Government should introduce inducements to progress along these lines.

S1M-3240# Donald Gorrie: Health in Developing Countries-That the Parliament encourages academic researchers and drug companies in Scotland to give a higher priority to developing medicines which will promote better health and nutrition in developing countries and considers that the Scottish Executive and Her Majesty's Government should introduce inducements to progress along these lines.
S1M-3240# Health in Developing Countries (lodged on 20 June 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3240# Health in Developing Countries (lodged on 20 June 2002) Michael Russell*
S1M-3240# Health in Developing Countries (lodged on 20 June 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3240# Health in Developing Countries (lodged on 20 June 2002) Shona Robison*
S1M-3240# Health in Developing Countries (lodged on 20 June 2002) Christine Grahame*, Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-3240# Health in Developing Countries (lodged on 20 June 2002) Ms Sandra White*
